content: the previous round this square was made using scheepjes catona and a 3mm hook copyright ©torunjohansson this pattern is for unlimited personal use please do not sell this pattern or redistribute it in any form items made using this pattern may be sold but please credit me as the designer if you post photos of items made from this pattern to any website or social media please include a link to the original pattern page on ravelry com if posting to instagram i would love to see your projects please use #northerndiamondsquare and @torunjcrochet so that i can admire your work happy crocheting see you on instagram @torunjcrochet 5 extended version round 7 change color start in any corner chain space chain 3 or work a standing double_crochet into chain space double_crochet into same chain space * double_crochet in following 19 stitches work 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet into chain space* repeat * to * two times double_crochet in following 19 stitches 2 double_crochet into chain space chain 2 and join with slip_stitch into 3rd chain of first chain 3 note the corner will be rather tight be careful not to miss the hidden stitch round 8 chain 3 = double_crochet double_crochet into following 22 stitches *work 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet into chain space double_crochet in following 23 stitches* repeat * to * two more times work 2dc chain 2 2 double_crochet into chain space join with slip_stitch into 3rd chain of first chain 3 fasten_off note again the corner will be rather tight be careful not to miss the hidden stitch round 9 change color start in any corner chain space chain 3 or work a standing double_crochet into the chain space double_crochet into same chain space *work a bpdc around the following 27 stitches work 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet into chain space* repeat * to * two times work bpdc around the remaining 27 stitches work 2 double_crochet into chain space chain 2 and join with slip_stitch into 3rd chain of first chain 3 fasten_off round 10 change color start in any corner chain space chain 2 = half_double_crochet *half_double_crochet in following 31 stitches work half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet into the chain space* repeat * to * two more times half_double_crochet in remaining 31 stitches half_double_crochet in chain space chain 2 and join with slip_stitch to 2nd chain of first half_double_crochet fasten_off copyright ©torunjohansson this pattern is for unlimited personal use please do not sell this pattern or redistribute it in any form items made using this pattern may be sold but please credit me as the designer if you post photos of items made from this pattern to any website or social media please include a link to the original pattern page on ravelry com if posting to instagram i would love to see your projects please use #northerndiamondsquare and @torunjcrochet so that i can admire your work happy crocheting see you on instagram @torunjcrochet 6
